page.title: 11Housing in Lea
page.content: The squares ref.5030 and 4931 consist of post war housing.Originally a ribbon development of private houses following Blackpool Rd.,the area has changed in character several times over the years.North of Blackpool Rd., an estate of private housing was followed by a large estate of Council houses to the South named the "Larches".Later a further Council estate called "Savick",was built next to the private housing.The Council estates have changed in character during recent years.Many homes are now privately owned and their appearance changed.A new private housing estate is currently being built to the north of the Savick estate by several speculative builders including Maunders,Salvensens and Wimpey.
